profile.name: Brian Vaughn
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Citadel | Brooklyn, NY
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for open-source development. Proficient in a range of programming languages and technologies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of multiple high-traffic web applications using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable architecture solutions.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices for coding, testing, and deployment.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom web applications using React, Redux, and GraphQL.
Worked with clients to understand their technical requirements and deliver tailored solutions.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects using Python, JavaScript, and C++.
Participated in code reviews and ensured adherence to best practices.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed software applications using Java, Spring, and Hibernate.
Collaborated with team members to design and implement new features.
